Package org.cyclops.structuredcrafting.craft.provider

Interface IItemStackProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
InventoryItemStackProviderNeoForge, WorldItemStackProviderBase, WorldItemStackProviderNeoForge
public interface IItemStackProvider
Types of providers for itemstacks

    • canProvideInput

      boolean canProvideInput()
      Returns:
      If this provider can provide item inputs.

      boolean isValidForResults(net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.core.Direction side)

      world - The world.
      pos - The position.
      side - The side.
      Returns:
      If valid.

    • hasItemStack

      If the given provider has an itemstack at the given position.
      Parameters:
      world - The world.
      pos - The position.
      side - The side.
      Returns:
      If it has an itemstack.

    • reduceItemStack

      boolean reduceItemStack(net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.core.Direction side, boolean simulate)
      Consumes one amount of the itemstack, will only work if such a stack existed.
      Parameters:
      world - The world.
      pos - The position.
      side - The side.
      simulate - If the operation should be simulated.
      Returns:
      If the item could be reduced

    • addItemStack

      Adds an itemstack.
      Parameters:
      world - The world.
      pos - The position.
      side - The side.
      itemStack - The itemstack to set.
      simulate - If the operation should be simulated.
      Returns:
      If the insertion succeeded.
